Name: TIGER GAME ROM KNIFE
About the game: Pin Anything You Want to Your Steam Library ! Now ! Only need 3 Steps In TIGER GAME ROM KNIFE ! First , Click The Open In The Menu To Open Your 'shortcuts.vdf' , It is in Your Steam 'Steam\userdata\YourID\config' If you can not find the shortcuts.vdf in your steam user folder You should use the add non-steam game in the Steam menu , add any one app The Steam will create a shortcut.vdf , then you can use it Second , Click The Button 'Add to My non-Steam Library', Select Which everyone You Want To Pin Finally , Click The Save In The Menu , And Exit App , Restart Your Steam. You Will Got You Want In the Steam Library. You Can Pin Anything, Such as Game Emulator ROM \ Game ISO \ Mp4 Movie \ Mp3 Music \ PDF Books \ Word \ PPT ... And Use Your Steam to run them . Support Pin Multi Files At Once
